contents.Text: The favourites is a menu to save searches/artists/songs permanently.
Allows the user to manage (Add,Remove) dropdowns and dropdown body's
Use this link[[[button:Select Key][Select Key]]]to go into more detail
Used to show the Dropdown Body's results and show playlists name
Clicking on an item searches it again
Right clicking deletes it the same way it does in[[[button:History][../History]]]
This "NULL" value is here since the user has not inputted a[[[button:Custom Item][Select Key]]]
The user needs to fill this value with something otherwise next restart the "Artist1" will be removed
